name: Chessire
description:
By vincepresso

This is a simple chess game that requires two people to play. It is a simple game of chess with mouse as the only means of control.

How to Install

1. Download Chessire.zip

2. Extract to a folder

3. Double click Chessire.exe

Select a piece then select the tile which you wish to move the piece upon. Once Player 1 (White) turn is ended, Player 2 (Black) can begin their turn. Continue until a player captures the enemy's King.

Unfortunately, Chessire cannot detect checkmate until the actual King is captured.
